Audio.Locality: Montezuma Peak Road, Pueblo Rico, Risaralda, W Andes - Tatama National Park
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Montane forest. Pair of small, dark birds in canopy. Light very poor but they looked like euphonias. Our guide, Disenia, listened to this recording and suggested Chlorophonia pyrrhophrys. This ID practically confirmed by comparison with XC51216.
